Host a "Recycling Olympics" competition among different neighborhoods to encourage friendly competition and increase participation.
Create a "Recycling Buddy" program, where residents can sign up to be paired with a friend, family member, or neighbor who shares their recycling goals and can help hold each other accountable.
Host a "Recycling Marketplace" event where residents can sell or trade gently used items made from recycled materials.
Develop a "Recycling Detective" game for schools, where students can learn about recycling and waste reduction while solving environmental mysteries.
